sentences.english: Aunt is ready for you to eat the teeth do not hurt the sugar, to taste, welcome to.
sentences.chinese: 阿姨准备了适合你吃不伤牙齿的糖，欢迎到时来尝尝。

sentences.english: Her teeth are very regular and white.
My teeth are very sensitive to cold food.
Her teeth were crooked, and she was a little overweight.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙齿长得歪歪扭扭，人也有点胖。

sentences.english: Its teeth were sharp and built for eating insects.
sentences.chinese: 它的牙齿很尖利，是为咀嚼昆虫准备的。

sentences.english: Miles grinned and shook his head while clicking his tongue against his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 迈尔斯摇着头咧开嘴笑了，用舌头敲着牙齿。

sentences.english: Each tooth has a space, the so-called pulp cavity.
sentences.chinese: 我们每颗牙齿里面都有一个空间，即所谓的牙髓腔。

sentences.english: Gorillas are very fierce-looking, with broad shoulders, powerful arms, and pointed teeth.
sentences.chinese: 狒狒样子凶猛，肩膀宽阔，手臂很长，牙齿尖锐。

sentences.english: She replied that it is not possible because of their old teeth.
sentences.chinese: 阿婆回答，老人家牙齿不好，没办法吃。

sentences.english: Whales use their pectinate teeth to gather plankton.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼用牠们栉齿状的牙齿来捉浮游生物。

sentences.english: As for teeth, the candidate with the straightest, wins the election.
sentences.chinese: 在牙齿方面，牙齿最整齐的候选人赢出大选。

sentences.english: As for teeth, the candidate with the straightest, wins the election.
sentences.chinese: 在牙齿方面，牙齿最整齐的候选人赢出大选。

sentences.english: The tooth hurts only when he bites down on it.
We everyday besides brush his teeth with tooth brush besides what cleanness tooth can you still use?
sentences.chinese: 我们每天除了用牙刷刷牙之外还能用什么清洁牙齿？

sentences.english: He had smoked for so many years that his teeth were permanently stained yellow.
sentences.chinese: 他吸了那么多年烟，牙齿都被永久地熏黄了。

definition: caries/rotten tooth (colloquial)/see also 齲齒|龋齿[qu3 chi3]
(of uneven surfaces) to fit together/(of gear wheels) to mesh/(dentistry) occlusion/bite
